title: 11: S3E11 - "Ravenous and Ruinous" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five terrifying tales from authors Jessica Charle, Justine Anastasia, Devin Hoover, Nicholas Gray, and T.C. Lewis, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about holiday horrors, terrifying toys, animal intentions, nightmarish numbers. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s3e11
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
